attributes.action: I would like you to put a hold on payment of council tax during the pandemic
attributes.additional_details: I would like parliament to consider this because the people of the United kingdom are loosing working hours and jobs all over. This is very stressful when we can't  afford to pay our bills when we simply don't have the money coming in as we no longer have the hours to work. Please consider this it would help the people massively.
attributes.background: A lot of people have had their work hours cut and have even lost their jobs. If you cancel payment of council tax during the pandemic it would relieve a lot of stress and would help households out. If you won't do this will you cut the payment by at least half? This will help our country a lot.

rejection.details:

Find out more and watch the Committee put questions suggested by petitioners to Government Ministers and the Deputy Chief Medical Officer: https://committees.parliament.uk/committee/326/petitions-committee/news/145767/committee-question-deputy-chief-medical-officer-and-ministers-on-coronavirus-response/
